decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from 22 September 2023. 
Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [290-SU-L01, 290-SU-100, 290-SU-101, 290-SU-102, 290-SU-103, 290-SU-104, 290-SU105, 290-SU-106, 290-SU-107, 290-SU-108, 290-SU-109, 290-SU-110, 290-SU-111, 290-SU-112, 290-SU-113, 290- DM-100, 290-DM-101, 290-DM-102, 290-DM-103, 290-DM-104, 290-DM-105, 290-DM-106, 290-DM-107, 290-DM108, 290-DM-109, 290-DM-110, 290-DM-111, 290-PH-01, 290-PH-02, 290-PH-03, Solar Photovoltaic Panels brochure, NIBE air source heat pumps brochure, Sketch for outdoor units, and Specification for outdoor units. Received: 26/6/2023, 290-PL-115, External Render and Internal Render. Received: 1/8/2023, Planning Compliance Report 26008.PCR.01 Rev B. Received: 1/9/2023, 290-SU-L02. Received: 6/9/2023, 290-PL-100, 290-PL-102, 290-PL-103, 290-PL-104, 290- PL-105, 290-PL-108, 290-PL-110, 290-PL-111 and 290-PL-112. Received: 18/9/2023
Proposed 3D Rear View � Rev A, Cover Letter, Calorex Inverter Heat Pumps brochure, Waterloo Acoustics drawing with elevation, plan and side section and Planning Compliance Report (Report 26008.PCR.01 RevD). Received: 17/5/2024
290-PL-101, 290-PL-106-A, 290-PL-107, 290-PL-109, 290-PL-113 and 290 - PL � 115, Unnumbered Proposed 3D Front View Rev A and Planning statement + Design and Access Statement 290-PS-101 Rev B. Received: 26/09/2024
Cover Letter. Received: 27/09/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - The level of noise emitted from heat pumps and the fan coil unit shall be at least 10dB below the background noise levels at all times near to the noise sensitive receptors. 
Reason: To prevent noise disturbance to nearby properties in accordance with policies CC1 Context and character, CC2 Urban design and architecture and EQ5 Noise of the adopted Local Plan.
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to increase the height of brick piers in the front garden to 1200mm of planning permission P/2023/2021 approved 23/09/2023 for the erection of a single storey rear extension, a first floor side extension, installation of six front roof windows, alterations to windows and doors on all elevations. Installation of railings, gate and bin store in the front garden. Proposed rationalisation of external soil and rainwater pipe layout. Installation of solar panels to the southern and western sides of the roof pitch. Installation of two air source heat pump in the rear garden.
